text: Tamen wen ni fuhuo zai shenme shihou shixian, ni shuo: Zhiyou wo de zhu zhidao, ta jiang zai shenme shihou shixian. Ni shuo: Zhiyou wo de zhu zhidao nage shihou, zhiyou ta neng zai yuding de shihou xianshi ta. Ta zai tiandi jian shi zhongda de, ta jiang turan jianglin nimen. Tamen wen ni, haoxiang ni duiyu ta shi hen shuxi de, ni shuo: Zhiyou zhenzhu zhidao ta zai shenme shihou shixian, dan zhongren daban bu zhidao (zhege daoli).
